---
category: news
title: "Hobbling Computer Vision Datasets Against Unauthorized Use"
excerpt: "Researchers from China have developed a method to copyright-protect image datasets used for computer vision training, by effectively ‘watermarking’ the images in the data, and then decrypting the ‘clean’ images via a cloud-based platform for authorized users only."
